about:
Hey there, I'm Jamie! I'm a Mechatronics engineer with 5+ years of experience in the automation industry. I primarily specialize in software development, and have experience across many different platforms and technologies.

 END-END, from conception, development and commecerlizatin. Within this time I have developed and commercialized multiple successful automation products. 

 I have an interest in many software fields, and have dabbled in areas such as computer vision, machine learning, web development and Internet of Things. 

 I'm always interested in hearing about exciting opportunites and making new connections, so don't be afraid to say hi!
